title: Ordningsregler
content:
This sample is from the "house rules" of a house built in the 50s. The paper might be from the same era, I'm not sure. Anyone recognize the typeface?   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224307im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/39094.jpg)
author: jsandvik

comments.content: The only book I have with any visibility into 50's typefaces is the Jaspert 'Encyclopaedia of Type Faces' and I couldn't find this in the sans serif types. Sorry.
Same here. I think this is an old metal face that never made it to North America. Perhaps someone with better European specimen books is reading this.
